content: to dry patting it into shape to measure 4 inches by 4 inches square use tapestry needle to weave in yarn ends although this is a very simple and straightforward pattern please respect the time taken to work it out and test it feel free to make copies of this pattern for yourself or fellow knitters i encourage you to knit mug mats to sell for charitable purposes i just ask that you not copy the pattern without the copyright in place and that you not sell any mug mats made from this pattern for your own personal gain thanks and happy knitting © 2010 annmarie aquino
